column1:
I
n  the  absence  of  an  alternative  report  this  Court 
is  not 
inclined  to  accept  the  said

submission  of  the  Learned  Counsel  for  the  Petitioners. 
It 
is  also  observed  that  the
Petitioners fears pertaining to flooding are based on assumptions.

A
ccordingly, for the reasons set out above in this Judgement this Court refuses to grant
formal notice and this application is dismissed without cost.
Judge of the Court of Appeal

A
rjuna Obeyesekere, J/ President of the Court of Appeal
President of the Court of Appeal
